sentences.en: He found me not so averse to an accommodation as some of my friends were.
sentences.cn: 他看出我并不像我的一些朋友那么反对和解.

sentences.en: He was averse to revealing the sources of his information.
sentences.cn: 他不乐意透露消息的来源.

sentences.en: He's not averse to publicity, of the right kind.
I am averse from any sort of fuss.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌任何无谓的纷扰.

sentences.en: I don't smoke cigarettes, but I'm not averse to the occasional cigar.
sentences.cn: 我不吸烟, 但我不反对偶尔抽一支雪茄.

sentences.en: I mentioned it to Kate and she wasn't averse to the idea.
sentences.cn: 我向凯特提起这个想法，她不反对。

sentences.en: I will keep It'secret, I feel averse to telling it to someone.
sentences.cn: 我会保守秘密, 不会告诉任何人.

sentences.en: I would not be averse to taking a drink.
Lanser said sternly, " I'm not averse to killing people if that finishes it. "
sentences.cn: 兰塞严正地说: “ 假如杀了人能够把事情结束,我也不反对. ”

sentences.en: She seemed averse to being under pecuniary obligations.
sentences.cn: 她似乎不愿在经济上仰人鼻息.

sentences.en: She was averse to the contemplation of death.
sentences.cn: 她不喜欢默念亡故的人.

sentences.en: She was so self - conceited that she was averse to all advice from others.
sentences.cn: 她是如此 自命不凡,以致听不得别人的任何忠告.

sentences.en: Some banks are risk averse (=  do not like taking a risk  ) .
sentences.cn: 有些银行不喜欢冒风险。

sentences.en: The minister is averse to / from flattery.
We are averse to such noisy surroundings.
sentences.cn: 我们不喜欢这么吵闹的环境.

trans.tran_cn: 不乐意的，反对的，[植]与茎方向相反的
trans.tran_en: unwilling to do something or not liking something
